definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: There are also humanitarian uses for sniffer bees.
sentences.chinese: 嗅探蜂还能应用于人道主义援助。

sentences.english: Nobility and dignity of people is the core values of humanitarian.
sentences.chinese: 人的高贵和尊严是人道主义的核心价值。

sentences.english: Which you agreed to do, being the humanitarian sort you are.
sentences.chinese: 这你也同意了，作为一个像你这样的人道主义者。

sentences.english: In the value system of legal social work, the key idea is humanitarianism.
sentences.chinese: 在法律社会工作价值体系中，其核心理念是人道主义。

sentences.english: Both of these two types of humanitarianism are responsible for the chaotic situation in education and society.
sentences.chinese: 这两种人道主义要为教育和社会领域的混乱无序负责。

sentences.english: These humanitarians often brave great danger, far from home.
sentences.chinese: 人道主义工作者往往冒着极大的危险，远离家庭。

sentences.english: They come from the arts and a humanitarian educational background.
sentences.chinese: 他们都是文科出生，并且受过人道主义教育。

sentences.english: Last year the court indicted the minister for humanitarian affairs in the Sudanese government, together with a janjaweed leader.
sentences.chinese: 去年法庭起诉了苏丹政府的人道主义事务部部长。

sentences.english: In reality, the word humanism has two very different meanings.
sentences.chinese: 说实在话，人道主义有两种完全不同的意义。

sentences.english: I am on the staff of CBN, a humanitarian organization.
sentences.chinese: “我们是一个人道主义组织”，贾马尔说。

sentences.english: Do you think this act of the Chinese Government is against the humanitarian spirit?
sentences.chinese: 你是否认为中国政府此举违背人道主义精神？

sentences.english: I solemnly pledge myself to devote my life to the service of humanity.
sentences.chinese: 我庄重地宣誓要把我的一生献给人道主义事业。

sentences.english: All these explain the humanism spirit hiding deep in Jin Yong's heart.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些都说明了金庸深藏于心底的人道主义精神。

sentences.english: The supporters of the Gaza-bound aid flotilla had more than humanitarian intentions.
sentences.chinese: 加沙救援船队的支持者的动机远不止于人道主义。

sentences.english: We will extend our persistence in deer collagen to the humanistic cause.
sentences.chinese: 我们将会把鹿胶原蛋白的执着延伸到人道主义事业。

sentences.english: You love falling in love with the ideals of humanitarian concepts.
sentences.chinese: 你爱爱上了人道主义概念的理想。
